page.title: 20Family Holidays
page.content: Nichola. (Holiday) On Saturday I got up at 8 AM and set the shower in the bathroom. After a shower I got dressed and had toast for breakfast. Then I went to the shop. There was a sign on the door saying that it was opening at 9 AM. I went back to the caravan to tell my dad I was going for a walk along the beach. After a long walk the shop had opened so I told dad who gave me some money. I bought a game then went to the amusement arcade. After dinner of fish and chips I went on the beach and paddled and sunbathed. In the afternoon we went to Rhyl and got back at 5 PM for tea. At 7.30 PM we went to the club for a drink then we came back at 10.30 PM. Then we went to bed.
